metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35538 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A crafted input file could cause a null pointer dereference in jcopy_sample_rows() when processed by libjpeg-turbo.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35538` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 2.1.2-0ubuntu1
libjpeg-turbo-test - 2.1.2-0ubuntu1
libjpeg-turbo8 - 2.1.2-0ubuntu1
libturbojpeg - 2.1.2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.2-0ubuntu1').
